content.raw:
**How to record:**

`roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch recording:=true extra_gazebo_args:="--record_path /home/tylerlum/log/mylog"` \(extra\_gazebo\_args is optional\)

**How to playback:**

`roslaunch vrx_gazebo playback.launch log_file:="/home/tylerlum/log/mylog/state.log"`
content.html:
How to record:

roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch recording:=true extra_gazebo_args:="--record_path /home/tylerlum/log/mylog" (extra_gazebo_args is optional)

How to playback:

roslaunch vrx_gazebo playback.launch log_file:="/home/tylerlum/log/mylog/state.log"
